title: The Bachelorette's Ciarran Stott will quit the show following the death of his grandmother
text:
The contestant who is set to quit The Bachelorette this week following a death in the family has been named.

As reported by New Idea on Monday, Ciarran Stott will leave the mansion after learning that his grandmother has unexpectedly died.

The 25-year-old Englishman reportedly stayed in the competition for a week after being told about the death, but eventually became too 'depressed' to continue.

Scroll down for video

The Bachelorette SPOILER: Ciarran Stott (pictured) has been revealed as the mystery suitor who quits the show this week after the death of his grandmother

After several days spent considering his options, he decided to fly back home to spend time with his family.

Ciarran will apparently clash with fellow contestant Jamie Doran at the cocktail party before announcing his decision to leave in an upcoming episode.

After changing out of his suit into causal clothes, Ciarran will reportedly pull Angie Kent aside to explain the situation.

Final bust-up: According to New Idea, Ciarran (right) will clash with fellow contestant Jamie Doran (left) at the cocktail party before announcing his decision to leave for personal reasons

This is reflected in a trailer for this week's episodes, in which Ciarran is shown taking off his jacket and yelling: 'I'm f**king done with this... I'm over it, get me out of here!'

'Despite both Angie and production wanting Ciarran to return, [he] decided it was best he closed his Bachelorette chapter,' said a source.

Ciarran's sad departure follows a string of unexpected exits so far this season.

Can't take it anymore: After changing out of his suit into causal clothes, Ciarran will reportedly pull Angie Kent aside to explain the situation. Pictured in a trailer for this week's episodes

During the show's second episode, Angie kicked Noosa politician Jess Glasgow to the kerb for his 'inappropriate' remarks during a photo shoot-themed group date.

Warwick Adams later quit after being made to dress up in a chicken suit.

The Bachelorette continues Wednesday at 7:30pm on Channel 10
